trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There were no other sightings in Colorado Springs on or around May 17th 2013
Summary: glowing sparkling big orb observed then disappeared after about 20 seconds
divs: sighting detailsi was opening a window that had no screen to look at something on the house and suddenly saw a very bright white\yellow\gold colored star like orb that traveled fairly fast across the sky in a straight line then disappeared after about 20 seconds. it was silent. there were also airplanes or helicopters in the sky but not near object. i have seen a ufo before that with one look knew it did not come from earth it was like a flying football stadium sized triangle ufo so i often look up at the sky. usually i can identify if something is a plane or a helicopter or just unknown object and it does not make me think much about it but this was different i really believe it was a ufo not from earth if it was a plane it was silent and bursting as an all light object like an intense fireball so i don't see how it could be ours it was not a flare or star and doubt it was a meteor.
